shinyplus 0.0.3

Launch PLUS Weekly Grocery App

Source: R/shinyplus.R
shinyplus.Rd

Launch PLUS Weekly Grocery App

shinyplus()

Disclaimer

This open-source R package, shinyplus, is independently developed and has no affiliation with, endorsement by, or association with PLUS Retail B.V. or the website plus.nl.

The package merely uses client-side browser automation via the chromote package to interact with publicly available content on plus.nl, simulating user behaviour (such as logging in, browsing, and selecting products) in a private, ephemeral local browser session. This package does not contain any product info or data from PLUS. Any icons or images used (e.g. the PLUS logo) are sourced from Wikipedia under appropriate free-use licensing. All trademarks, product names, and brand assets remain the property of their respective owners.
